question: You recently saw an advertisement in a newspaper seeking volunteers to do unpaid work with local children. You are interested in this work. Write a letter to the head of the organisation. In your letter express your interestask for details of the work that needs to be donelet them know when you are available.
text: I am writing this letter in connection with your advertisement regarding unpaid work with local children. I am really excited working about work with juveniles as it will help me to gain experience in the related field and succeed in the near future.

I love being around youngsters, as they are innocent, imaginative and lovely. I have been teaching the little ones from this town through an NGO called ''educate the youths'' for 10 months. To add on,
I'm really patient, and friendly and maintain a great relationship with them.
I would like to enquire about the working days along with the documents required for this job. It would also be of great help if you tell me the number of working hours required.

At last, I would like to share that I will not able to work until March, as I have already been teaching children through an NGO. However, from the 1st of April, I am available from Monday to Friday between 7.00 am to 3.00. P.m.
Looking forward to hearing from you
